Package org.arl.fjage

Class TestBehavior

java.lang.Object
org.arl.fjage.Behavior
org.arl.fjage.OneShotBehavior
org.arl.fjage.TestBehavior
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Behavior>
public class TestBehavior extends OneShotBehavior
A behavior for JUnit test case design. This behavior is executed only once. The test() method of this behavior is called only once. Any AssertionError encountered during the test is stored and can be later thrown using the checkAssertions() method.

Typical usage of this behavior is shown below: 

 // setup
 Platform platform = new RealtimePlatform();
 Container container = new Container(platform);
 Agent agent = new Agent();
 container.add(agent);
 platform.start();

 // test
 TestBehavior test = new TestBehavior() {
   public void test() {
     :
     :
   }
 };
 test.runOn(agent);

 // tear down
 platform.shutdown();
